about_the_game:
Welcome to KoW, the ultimate tower defense game that brings together strategy, magic, and nature! With stunning graphics and immersive gameplay, KoW lets you experience the thrill of defending your kingdom against hordes of enemies with powerful walls, devastating spells, and cunning tactics.

In KoW, you get to build and upgrade walls, each with unique abilities and strengths, and choose from a range of spells that can heal, damage, or stun your enemies. With a vast array of powerful spells and formidable walls, KoW offers endless possibilities for players to create unique and strategic combinations to defend their hero and outsmart their opponents.

As you progress through the game, you'll encounter new and challenging enemies that will test your skills and strategy. You can customize your deck by adding new walls and spells or tripling existing cards to gain powerful treasures.

With each round, you get to modify your deck and try out new combinations to find the perfect defense against your foes. You'll need to be quick on your feet and adaptable to succeed in KoW.

So gather your wits, summon your magic, and join the battle in KoW. Are you ready to become the ultimate defender of your kingdom and triumph over all enemies? The fate of your kingdom depends on it!

Welcome to KoW, the ultimate tower defense game that brings together strategy, magic, and nature! With stunning graphics and immersive gameplay, KoW lets you experience the thrill of defending your kingdom against hordes of enemies with powerful walls, devastating spells, and cunning tactics.

In KoW, you get to build and upgrade walls, each with unique abilities and strengths, and choose from a range of spells that can heal, damage, or stun your enemies. With a vast array of powerful spells and formidable walls, KoW offers endless possibilities for players to create unique and strategic combinations to defend their hero and outsmart their opponents.

As you progress through the game, you'll encounter new and challenging enemies that will test your skills and strategy. You can customize your deck by adding new walls and spells or tripling existing cards to gain powerful treasures.

With each round, you get to modify your deck and try out new combinations to find the perfect defense against your foes. You'll need to be quick on your feet and adaptable to succeed in KoW.

So gather your wits, summon your magic, and join the battle in KoW. Are you ready to become the ultimate defender of your kingdom and triumph over all enemies? The fate of your kingdom depends on it!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS 10.15
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon Pro 560X or better
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS 10.15
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon Pro 560X or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

name: Knock Out Walls

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 450 GTS / Radeon HD 5750 or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 460 / Radeon HD 7800 or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Reign supreme in a world of walls and spells. Discover powerful strategies and outsmart your rivals with cunning tactics to rise through the ranks and become the one true Wallstar!
